article_title: What the Obamacare ruling means for North Carolinians, businesses & hospitals
article_text:
Fayetteville, NC (28302)

Today

Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 89F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Mostly clear. Low 61F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: Paige Rentz, staff writer

og.description: Thursday's decision on the health care law by the Supreme Court has a direct effect on thousands of people in the Cape Fear region, as well as on hospitals and
